mapper.select: SELECT USER_NICKNAME,LEVEL_NAME FROM USERINFO LEFT JOIN USERLEVEL ON(USERINFO.USER_LEVEL = USERLEVEL.LEVEL_CODE) WHERE USER_NICKNAME = #{clickNickName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DECLARATION_LIST(DECLARATION_NO ,REPORTER ,REPORTED ,REPORT_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_DNO.NEXTVAL ,(SELECT USER_ID FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_NICKNAME=#{reporter}) ,(SELECT USER_ID FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_NICKNAME=#{reported}) ,#{reportContent})
